about_the_game:
♿️ Dear Jiji citizens, brutes, and IKUN：

        Here, I would like to express my heartfelt thanks to all of you for coming here in your busy schedule to enjoy the autopsy ceremony of "Meme God" with us.

In the ancient era, there was an evil god who controlled the Centre parting hair, basketball, and chicken, the Void KUN God. After the war of the gods, It is sealed in the darkest underground abyss of the world of A r mi no s. Now the power of the Void KUN God is gradually returning, and it will return to the surface and devour all life into an army of KUN people to take revenge on the gods.

Players will sign a contract with the Mamba Demon and use the power of the Mamba to resurrect the 24 fallen warriors of the JIJI Kingdom. And in the limited time, train your team, collect all kinds of abstract equipment, and take the "Stick Mother Search" to weaken the power of the Void KUN King in various parts of the world.

Timeless turn-based battles that allow you to regain the feeling of virginity. More than 40 abstract characters can play!

18 unique levels (and counting), random weather, wild interactions, and a reward system. "Kids, I'm going to travel the world"

More than 300 pieces of equipment, more than 40 kinds of set effects.

“If you want it, then you'll have to take it.”

More than 30 random events as warm as the sun will bring a glimmer of hope to your desperate life.

(Wow!!There are also some powerful hidden events, which will surprise you unexpectedly! ）

Elder Evil God: Every 20 days after the in-game countdown, a random Elder Evil God will awaken (with advance notice). The Elder Evil God will bring all sorts of negative effects to you, unless he's gone to hell.

Final Boss - King of the Void KUN: When the 100-day countdown is exhausted, your team will be forced to go to KUN City for the final showdown. Destroying the Evil KUN Temples around the world before that can weaken the power of the Void KUN King. If you're strong enough, you can try to head to KUN City in advance to challenge the King of Void KUN.

"When you hear 'Chicken, you're too beautiful,' run, don't look back, and keep an eye on the basketball on the ground."

        Cover the coffin!

        Finally, I would like to express my sincere gratitude to all of you for coming.

                                                                                                                              Stick Mother

                                                                                                                     December 3, 2024♿️

                                                                                                       

Coffin autopsy QQ group: 1013566324

name: 畜神

  • Processor: Intel core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT640
  • Storage: 1.14514 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX750
  • Storage: 3.50234 GB available space

short_description: Animal God is a rogue-lite turn-based RPG. Players will make a pact with the Mamba Demon and use the power of the Mamba to resurrect the 24 fallen warriors. And in the limited time, train your own team and take the "Stick Mother Search" to go around the world to weaken the power of the Void King.
